user_id.description:
An external identifier for the user who is associated with the request.

This should be a uuid, hash value, or other opaque identifier. Anthropic may use this id to help detect abuse. Do not include any identifying information such as name, email address, or phone æ•°å­—.

Determines how many tokens Claude can use for its internal reasoning process. Larger budgets can enable more thorough analysis for complex problems, improving response quality. 

Must be â‰¥1024 and less than `è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§ token æ•°`.
